85021.「タッツィ。今の話 聞いていましたね？\n さあ こちらの方に ごあいさつなさい:
Tazzi. You heard what I said, didn't you? Come
on, say hello to this gentleman.

85022.「こ……こんにちは！ 僕は タッツィです。\n マスターの弟子の ひとりとして\:
Hello! My name is Tazzi. As one of Master's
disciples, I work on my training everyday.

85023.「タッツィは 私の 有望な教え子……。\n 今から あなたに課す試練の案内を\n:
Tazzi is a promising student of mine and I now
turn to her to guide you through the trial
that I am about to put you through.

85024.「ぼ……僕ですか！？\n そんな 責任のある役\n 僕なんかに 務まるでしょうか:
Me? I don't know if I can handle such a
responsible role...

85025.「これは あなたへの修練も兼ねているのですよ。\n できないでは 許されません。:
This is also a training for you. We will not
tolerate the I can't do it attitude. You must
accomplish it.

85026.「……わかりました。\n 先生のご期待に そえるように\n 精一杯 がんばります:
I understand. I will do my best to meet your
expectations!

85027.「<pc>さん……。\n 僕 一生懸命 お務めします。\n どうか よろしくお願:
<pc>... I will try my best to serve
you. I would appreciate it if you could help
me out.

85028.「試練は 特別な場所に移動して\n おこないますから\n 準備ができたら 僕に話:
The trial will take place in a special place,
so please talk to me when you are ready.

85029.「よかった……。\n 移動は うまくいったようです。:
Thank goodness... the move seems to have gone
well.

85030.「試練の魔物との戦いは ここでおこないます。\n 今から 僕が 召喚しますから\:
The battle against the monsters of the trial
will take place here. I will summon them now,
so please wait a moment.

85031.「あぁ……ドキドキしてきました。\n ひとりで試練の案内をするのは はじめてで…:
Oh...I'm getting nervous. This is my first
time to guide you through the trial by
myself... sorry if it doesn't go well.

85032.「僕は マスターの教え子の中では\n いちばん年下で 経歴も浅くて そのことを\:
I was the youngest of Master's students and
had a short career, and I had always felt a
little bit inferior to him, but...

85033.「この試練がうまくいけば マスターも 少しは\n 僕のことを 見直してくれるかも:
If this trial goes well, maybe Master will
reconsider me a little. Let's do our best.

85034.「深淵に潜みし 異界の魔獣よ……\n 我が召喚に応え 今 ここに来たれ！:
You monsters of the other world, lurking in
the abyss, answer my summons and come here
now!

85035.「し しまった……！\n こんな強い魔物が 出るなんて……。:
Oh, no...! I didn't know there was such a
strong monster out there...

85036.「念のためと思って 見にきてみれば……。: Just in case, I came back to take a look...

85037.「タッツィ……このありさまは\n いったい どういうことですか？: Tazzi...what the hell is going on here?

85038.「マスター……すみません。\n 意気込み過ぎてしまったせいか\n つい こんな凶:
Master...I'm sorry. Perhaps I was too
enthusiastic... and I ended up creating such a
vicious monster...

85039.「そうではありません タッツィ。\n 人は絶望に直面し それを乗り越えることで\:
Not so, Tazzi. It is only when a person faces
despair and overcomes it that they grow beyond
their limitations.

85040.「せめて もう１体 同じ魔物を召喚なさい。\n それでこそ <cs_pchero:
Summon at least one more of the same monster.
That's what makes <cs_pchero> a worthy
opponent for your despair.

85041.「……し 失礼しました！\n ただいま 召喚いたします！: I'm sorry! I'll summon him now!

85042.「お待たせしました <cs_pchero>さん。\n それでは この魔物たちを倒:
Here you go <cs_pchero>. Now then, defeat
these monsters and conquer the trial with
flying colors!

85043.「お見事です <cs_pchero>さん。\n あなたなら この試練を\n 乗り:
Well done <cs_pchero>. I had no doubt you
would make it through this trial.

85044.「タッツィも よくがんばりました。 \n 今後は 試練への挑戦者に 変に遠慮せず:
Tazzi did a great job. From now on do your
best to help those who are going through
trials.

85047.「お約束した通り 試練に打ち勝った あなたに\n 新たに 特別なスキルポイントを:
As promised, you have beaten the test, and we
are opening the way for you to earn new,
special skill points.

85048.「くわしい話は ダーマ神殿でしましょう。\n 私は ひとまず先に 失礼いたします:
We will discuss this in detail at Alltrades
Abbey. I will leave you first.

85049.「僕の修練に 付き合ってくれて\n 本当に ありがとうございました。\n <cs:
Thank you very much for accompanying me in my
training. <cs_pchero> you must be very
strong.

85050.「僕……少し 自信がついたみたいです。\n また こうして お相手することがあっ:
I...seem to have gained some confidence. If I
ever have the chance to play with you like
this again, I would appreciate it very much!
